SA11sanss19u:3_0: sa tathāgatacaitye vā tathāgatavigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarvasatvānāṃ dauḥśīlyadaurgandhyamalâpanayanāya tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya ca pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanss19u:6_0: sa puṣpacchatram āropayan sarvasatvānāṃ sarvakleśaparidāhavigamāya pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanss19u:7_0: sa vihāraṃ praviśann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:12_0: sa labhanadvāram udghāṭayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:18_0: sa dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:20_0: sa tato vyuttiṣṭhann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:22_0: sa śarīragatyā gacchann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:26_0: sa śaucaṃ kurvann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:27_0: sarvasatvānāṃ kleśamalāt prakṣālayeyaṃ /sa hastau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:30_0: vāsanām apanayeyaṃ /sa pādau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati sarvasatvānām anekaprakārāṇi kleśarajāṃsy apanayeyaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:32_0: sa dantakāṣṭhaṃ bhakṣayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:36_0: sarvasatvā vandanīyā bhavantu sadevakasya lokasyêti //athavā yathâryaprajñāpāramitāyāṃ /
SA11sanss19u:37_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra vyāḍakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyam na saṃtrāsam āpattavyam /
SA11sanss19u:39_0: tathā hi tena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sarvasatvānām arthāya /
SA11sanss19u:40_0: tenâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam /sacen māṃ vyāḍā bhakṣayeyus tebhyâiva tad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
SA11sanss19u:43_0: tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbo-
SA11sanss19u:45_0: dhim abhisambuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre tiryagyonigatāḥ satvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante /
SA11sanss19u:45_1: /corakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:46_0: sarvasvaparityāgakuśalā hi te bodhisatvā mahāsatvôtsṛṣṭakāyenâpi ca bodhisatvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktapariṣkārôpakaraṇena ca /
SA11sanss19u:47_1: te cen me satvāḥ pariṣkārôpakaraṇāni haranti tebhyâivâitad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
SA11sanss19u:48_0: sacen māṃ kecij jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ tatra mayā na dveṣo na krodhôtpādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:49_0: teṣām api mayā na kāyena na vacasā na manasâparāddhavyaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:50_0: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati /
SA11sanss19u:51_0: anuttarā ca me samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāsannā bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanss19u:52_0: tathā ca kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre /
SA11sanss19u:53_0: ete cânye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante /
SA11sanss19u:57_0: tvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /tat kasmād dhetoḥ /
SA11sanss19u:61_0: na bodhisatvena mahāsatvena saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /saced ahaṃ tṛṣṇayā kālaṃ kariṣyāmi /
SA11sanss19u:62_0: api tu khalu punaḥ satvānām antike mahākaruṇācittam utpādayiṣyāmi /
SA11sanss19u:63_0: aho vatâlpapuṇyâmī satvā yad eteṣāṃ loke evaṃrūpāṇi pānīyakāntārāṇi prajñāyante /
SA11sanss19u:64_0_0: tathā punar ahaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre
SA11sanss19u:64_0_1: sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na prajñāsyante /
SA11sanss19u:65_0: tathā ca sarvasatvān puṇyaiḥ saṃyojayiṣyāmi yathâṣṭâṅgôpetapānīyalābhino bhaviṣyanti /
SA11sanss19u:66_0: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtaśo yathā vīryapāramitā tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti /
SA11sanss19u:66_1: /punar aparaṃ śāriputra bubhukṣākāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:68_0: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye tathā ca svaṃ bu-
SA11sanss19u:70_0_0: ddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ
SA11sanss19u:70_0_1: sarvathā sarvaṃ evaṃrūpāṇi bubhukṣākāntārāṇi na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante /
SA11sanss19u:72_0: sarvasukhasamarpitās tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ yo yâivâbhiprāyo bhaviṣyati yad yad evâkāṅkṣiṣyanti manasā tat tad eva prādurbhaviṣyati /
SA11sanss19u:73_0: tad yathâpi nāma devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ manasā sarvaṃ prādurbhavati manasā sarvam utpadyate /
SA11sanss19u:74_0: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ dhārmikâbhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti /
SA11sanss19u:75_0: avaikalyaṃ ca jīvitapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasatvānāṃ bhaviṣyati sarveṣāṃ sarvataḥ sarvadêti /
SA11sanss19u:86_0: smṛtimāṃś ca bhavati matimāṃś ca bhavati buddhimāṃś ca bhavati gatimāṃś ca bhavati dhṛtimāṃś ca bhavati prajñāvāṃś ca bhavati /
SA11sanss19u:101_0: ime maitreya viṃśatir anuśaṃsêti //āryaprajñāpāramitāyāṃ tv āha /
SA11sanss19u:102_0: sacet tvam ānanda śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śrāvakabhūmau dharmaṃ deśeyaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:103_0: tasyāṃ ca dharmadeśanāyāṃ ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'rhatvaṃ sākṣāt kuryus tad adyâpi tvayā me śrāvakeṇa śrāvakakṛtyaṃ na kṛtaṃ syāt /
SA11sanss19u:104_0: sacet punaḥ tvam ānanda bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyâikam api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ deśayeḥ prakāśayer evam ahaṃ tvayā śrāvakeṇârādhitaḥ syāṃ /
SA11sanss19u:105_0: tayā ca pūrvikayā dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'rhatvaṃ prāpnuyus teṣāṃ cârhatāṃ yad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlama-
SA11sanss19u:108_0: tat kiṃ manyase ānandâpi tu sa bahu puṇyaskandhaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:112_0: ataḥ sânanda śrāvakayānikapudgalo bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA11sanss19u:113_0: ato 'py ānanda bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'parasya bodhisatvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA11sanss19u:122_0: idam ānanda tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dharmadānaṃ sarvaśrāvakayānikānām api sarvapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ kuśalamūlam abhibhavati /
SA11sanss19u:124_0: evaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ samanvāharann asthānam ānandânavakāśo yat sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vivartetânuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
SA11sanss19u:125_0: nâitat sthānaṃ vidyatae iti //kathaṃ dharmadānaṃ dātavyaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:128_0: nu paṇḍitaḥ praviśya layanaṃ tatha ghaṭṭayitvā /
SA11sanss19u:129_0: vipaśya dharmaṃ imi sarva yoniśo utthāya deśetâlīnacittaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:129_1: /sukhasthito bhoti sadā vicakṣaṇo sukhaṃ niṣaṇṇas tatha dharma bhāsate /
SA11sanss19u:130_1: /caukṣaṃ ca so cīvara prāvaritvā suraktaraṅgaṃ ca prasannaraṅgaiḥ /
SA11sanss19u:131_0: āsevakaṃ kṛṣṇa tathā daditvā mahāpramāṇaṃ ca nivāsayitvā //
SA11sanss19u:134_0: sudhautapādaś côpāruhitvā snigdhena śīrṣeṇa mukhena câpi /
SA11sanss19u:134_1: /dharmâsane tatra niṣīdiyānaḥ ekâgra satveṣu samaṃ vipaśyan /
SA11sanss19u:135_0: upasaṃharec citrakathā bahūś ca bhikṣūnaś cô bhikṣunikās tathâiva /
SA11sanss19u:135_1: /kilāsitāś câpi vivarjayīta na câpi utpādayi khedasaṃjñāṃ /
SA11sanss19u:136_0: aratiṃ ca sarvāṃ vijahīta paṇḍitaḥ maitrībalaṃ parṣadi bhāvayec ca /
SA11sanss19u:136_1: /bhāṣec ca rātriṃdivam agradharmān dṛṣṭântakoṭīniyutaiḥ sa paṇḍitaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:137_0: saṃharṣayet tāṃ ca tathâiva toṣayet na câpi kiñcit tatra jātu prārthayet /
SA11sanss19u:137_1: /khŌüdyaṃ ca bhojyaṃ ca tathânnapŌünaṃ vastrŌüṇi śayyâsanacīvarŌüṇi /
SA11sanss19u:138_0: gilānabhaiṣajya na cintayet saḥ na vijñape-
SA11sanss19u:142_0: anyatra cinteya sadā vicakṣaṇaḥ bhaveya buddho 'ham ime ca satvā /
SA11sanss19u:143_0: etac ca me sarvasukhôpadhānaṃ yaṃ dharma śrāvemi hitāya loke //atrâivâha //
SA11sanss19u:144_0: na kasyacid antaśo dharmapremṇâpy adhikataram anugrahaṃ karoti //
SA11sanss19u:146_0: adhyeṣayeyur yadi tvāṃ te dharmadānasya kāraṇāt /
SA11sanss19u:148_0: evaṃ tvaṃ*vāca bhāṣeyā yuṣme vā vijñapaṇḍitāḥ /
SA11sanss19u:149_0: kathaṃ mahâtmanāṃ śakyaṃ purato bhāṣituṃ mayā //
SA11sanss19u:150_0: sahasâiṣāṃ na jalpeta tulayitvā tu bhājanaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:152_0: yadi duḥśīlān paśyesi pariṣāyāṃ bahūn sthitān /
SA11sanss19u:153_0: saṃlekhaṃ mā prabhāṣe tvaṃ varṇaṃ dānasya kīrtayeḥ //
SA11sanss19u:154_0: bhaveyur yadi câlpêcchāḥ śuddhāḥ śīle pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
SA11sanss19u:155_0: maitraṃ cittaṃ janitvā tvaṃ kuryāḥ saṃlekhikīṃ kathām //
SA11sanss19u:158_0: labdhapakṣas tadā bhūtvā varṇaṃ śīlasya kīrtayeḥ /
SA11sanss19u:185_0: imāni sāgaramate mantrapadāni dharmabhāṇakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmâsanakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmâsananiṣaṇṇena sarvāṃ parṣadaṃ bodhyākārâbhinirhṛtayā maitryā spharitvā /
SA11sanss19u:186_0_0: ātmani vaidyasaṃjñām utpādya dharme bhaiṣajyasaṃjñāṃ dharmaśravaṇikeṣv āturasaṃjñāṃ tathāgate satpuruṣasaṃjñāṃ dharmanetryāṃ
SA11sanss19u:186_0_1: cirasthitikasaṃjñām utpādyêmāni mantrapadāny āmukhīkṛtya dharmasaṃkathā karaṇīyā /
SA11sanss19u:187_0: tasya samantād yo janaśate na māro na mārakāyikā vā devatôpasaṃkramayiṣyanti vicakṣuḥkaraṇe /
SA11sanss19u:188_0: ye 'py enam upasaṃkramiṣyanti te 'py asya na śakṣyanty antarāyaṃ kartum iti //atrâivâha /
SA11sanss19u:189_0: dharmabhāṇakena caukṣeṇa śucisamudācāreṇa susnātena śucinivāsitena bhavitavyam iti /
SA11sanss19u:191_0: bodhicittaṃ ca puṇyasya vṛddhihetuḥ samāsataḥ //yathôktam āryaratnakaraṇḍakasūtre /
SA11sanss19u:192_0: tad yathâpi nāma mañjuśrīr nānāgandhavṛkṣāś ca caturdhātusaṃgṛhītā vivardhante /
SA11sanss19u:193_0: evam eva mañjuśrīr nānāsaṃbhārôpacitaṃ bodhisatvasya kuśalamūlaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:198_0: vistaratas tu buddhaviṣayâiva //atra câsyā yathôktāyāḥ śikṣāyāḥ /
SA11sanss19u:200_1: /tatrânutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāyâiva chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchati vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti samyakpraṇidadhātîty anena rakṣā /
SA11sanss19u:200_2: /utpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayatîty anena śuddhiḥ /
SA11sanss19u:201_0: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṃ janayati /
SA11sanss19u:202_0: yāvad utpannānāṃ ca sthitaye bhūyobhāvāya chandaṃ janayatîty ādi /
SA11sanss19u:204_0: etāni ca nityam apramādâdhiṣṭhitāni kāryāṇi sarvakuśalamūlānāṃ tanmūlatvāt /
SA11sanss19u:205_0: yāvanta dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ prakīrtitāḥ śīlaśrutaṃ tyāgu tathâiva kṣāntiḥ /
SA11sanss19u:206_0: sarveṣu mūlaṃ hy ayam apramādo nidhānalambhaḥ sugatena deśita /
SA11sanss19u:210_0: tad yathā tīvrakopaprasādasya rājño bhaiṣajyatailaparipūrṇabhājanaṃ gṛhītvā picchila-
SA11sanss19u:215_0: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
SA11sanss19u:217_0: evaṃ yāvan manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
SA11sanss19u:219_0: sarvadharmeṣv āsvādaṃ câdīnavaṃ ca niḥśaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA11sanss19u:220_0: ayam ucyate 'pramādaḥ //punar aparam apramādo yat svacittasya damanaṃ paracittasyârakṣā kleśarater aparikarmaṇā dharmarater anuvartanaṃ yāvad ayam ucyate 'pramādaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:221_0: yasya guhyakâdhipate śraddhā câpramādaś ca tasyânulomikena vīryeṇa kāryaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:222_0: yena tān apramādakāraṇān śraddhākāraṇāṃś ca dharmān samudānayati /
SA11sanss19u:223_0: yasya guhyakâdhipate śraddhā câpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca tena smṛtisaṃprajanye yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:224_0: yena smṛtisaṃprajanyena sarvān bodhipakṣān dharmān na vipraṇāśayati /
SA11sanss19u:225_0: yasya guhyakâdhipate śraddhā câpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca smṛtisaṃprajanyaṃ ca tena yoniśaḥ prayoge yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:226_0: yoniśaḥ prayukto hi guhyakâdhipate bodhisatvo yad asti tad astîti prajānāti /
SA11sanss19u:228_0: yāvad asti saṃvṛtyā cakṣur ity ādi //tathā atrâivâha /
SA11sanss19u:232_0: yad yoniśaś câiva vivekacittam aparigrahaḥ sarvasukhasya mūlam iti //āha ca /
SA11sanss19u:236_0: tatkūlaṃ na svataḥ pāraṃ kim apekṣyâstv apāratā /
SA11sanss19u:237_0: ātmatvaṃ na svataḥ siddhaṃ kim apekṣya paro bhavet /
SA11sanss19u:237_1: /tadduṣkhena na me bādhêty ato yadi na rakṣasi /
SA11sanss19u:238_0: nâgāmikāyaduṣkhāt te bādhā tat kena rakṣasi //aham eva tadâpîti mithyêyaṃ parikalpanā /
SA11sanss19u:239_0: anyâiva mṛto yasmād anyas tatra prajāyate //anyaś cej jāyate tatra kiṃ puṇyena prayojanaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:240_0: yūnaḥ kiṃ vṛddhakāyasya sukhāya dhanasaṃcayaiḥ //mṛte garbhagate tāvad anyo bālaḥ prajāyate /
SA11sanss19u:247_0: kāyaś cet pratimâkāraḥ pesībhasmasu nâsti saḥ /
SA11sanss19u:249_0: kāyêty ucyate na saḥ //tatra cintâiva me nâsti dṛśyakāyas tu nāśavān /
SA11sanss19u:250_0: avasthābhiś ca saṃbandhaḥ saṃvṛtyā câiva dṛśyate //
SA11sanss19u:255_0: na guṇavyatirekeṇa pradhānaṃ vidyate yataḥ //na ca trīṇi pradhānāni tathā sattā guṇâpi /
SA11sanss19u:256_0: pratyekaṃ tryātmakās te 'pi śeṣaṃ nâikavidhaṃ jagat /
SA11sanss19u:257_0: sukhâder na paṭṭôtpattiḥ paṭṭâdes tu sukhâdayaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:258_3: /svasaṃtāne ca dṛṣṭo 'sau nityeṣu ca kathaṃ yathā /
SA11sanss19u:260_0: evaṃ bhāvā na lakṣyante kṣīyamānāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ //saṃtānaḥ samudŌüyaś ca paṅktisenâdivan mṛṣŌü /
SA11sanss19u:261_0: tatrâbhyāsād ahaṃkāraḥ parasmin kiṃ na jāyate //
SA11sanss19u:264_0: aprāptam eva tad duṣkhaṃ pratikāryaṃ parâtmanoḥ //ayuktam api ced etat svâtmany astîtaratra na /
SA11sanss19u:265_0: yad ayuktaṃ nivartyaṃ tat svam anyad vā yathābalaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:265_1: /kṛpayā bahu duṣkhaṃ cet kasmād utpādyate balāt /
SA11sanss19u:266_0: jagadduṣkhaṃ nirūpyêdaṃ kṛpāduṣkhaṃ kathaṃ bahu //evaṃ bhāvitasaṃtānāḥ paraduṣkhasamapriyāḥ /
SA11sanss19u:267_0: avīcīm avagāhante haṃsāḥ padmavanaṃ yathā //satveṣu mucyamāneṣu ye te prāmodyasāgarāḥ /
SA11sanss19u:268_0: tair eva nanu paryāptaṃ mokṣeṇâpy arasena kim //
SA11sanss19u:269_0: evaṃ parârthaṃ kṛtvâpi na mado na ca vismayaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:278_0: puṇyaṃ pravartate tasmād anantaṃ satvadhātuvat //ayaṃ sa mārgapravaraḥ kṣemânantasukhôtsavaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:284_0: parâtmaduṣkhaśāntyartham ātmâdīn sarvathôtsṛjet //tṛṣṇā parigraho yasya tasya duṣkhaṃ na śāmyati /
SA11sanss19u:285_0: pariṇāmavināśitvāt sa duṣkhajanako yataḥ //loke duṣkhâgnitapte ca kā ratiḥ susukhe bhavet /
SA11sanss19u:286_0: samantād dahyamānasya nakhâdāhe 'pi kiṃ sukham //ātmatṛṣṇā ca sarveṣāṃ duṣkhāṇāṃ mūlam uttamaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:287_0: tasmān nihanmi tām eva satvebhyaḥ svârtham utsṛjan //
SA11sanss19u:290_0: ātmatatvasmṛtiṃ kṛtvā pratītyôtpādacintayā //yad bhayān nôtsṛjāmy etat tad evâdadato bhayaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:291_0: pratikṣaṇaṃ hi yāty eva kāyaś cittaṃ ca me yataḥ //yadi ni-
SA11sanss19u:294_0: bodhiḥ kāyena labhyeta nanu labdhā mayâiva sā //evam ātmānam utsṛjya sarvasatvârtham ācaret /
SA11sanss19u:296_0: yuktyā saṃrakṣya tu dravyaṃ satveṣu vôpayojayet //svakāye parakāye vā yad duṣkhaṃ nêha duṣkhakṛt /
SA11sanss19u:300_0: kopaḥ kasyârtham adyâpi mṛṣā vā tan mayôditam //svârthaghneṣu yadi dveṣaḥ kṛpā kutra bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanss19u:301_0: nirdayasyâpi kaḥ kopaḥ parârtho yadi naśyati //
SA11sanss19u:304_0: svāmy-asanena durnyastā nôpabhogyā bhavanti te //cintayati pratīkāraṃ na ca svāmihitêcchayā /
SA11sanss19u:305_0: nâpi saṃcodayaty enaṃ bhogârthaṃ nôpayāti ca //anusmṛtyôpasmṛtyâitān akṛṣṭôptā jinâtmajāḥ /
SA11sanss19u:306_0: nānāviṣayadhātūnāṃ sārvêndriyamahāgadān //vijñapya smārayitvâitān kruddhān apy upakāriṇaḥ
SA11sanss19u:310_0: yāvat satvāḥ sthitās tāvat sarveṣām arthakāriṇaḥ //sarvaduścaritenâiṣāṃ satvârthād vinivartanaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:311_0: evam etān karomy eṣa dhātūn ṣaḍ api nirvyathān //yāvad ākāśaniṣṭasya niṣṭhā lokasya saṃbhavet /
SA11sanss19u:315_0: kâiva mama duṣkhena duṣkhī syān me bhayād bhayī /
SA11sanss19u:316_0: taddoṣânuśayajño vā yathâtmagurur ātmanaḥ //avirāgy- apalāyī ca karuṇāviṣayo 'pi vā /
SA11sanss19u:317_0: nityasaṃnihitaś câpi śiṣyâtmasamaḥ kutaḥ //kleśônmatto 'tha mohândhaḥ prapātabahule pathi /
SA11sanss19u:318_0: skhalan pade pade śocyaḥ parâtmā ca sarvadā //skhalitânveṣaṇaṃ tasmāt samānavyasanāj janāt /
SA11sanss19u:319_0: na yuktaṃ yujyate tv atra guṇān dṛṣṭvâdbhutaṃ mahat //nâikena śakyam ādātuṃ mayā doṣamahôdadhiḥ /
SA11sanss19u:320_0: kṛtyam anyair mamâivâtra ko 'nyadoṣeṣu mêkṣaṇaḥ //paracodanadakṣāṇām anadhīṣṭôpakāriṇāṃ /
SA11sanss19u:321_0: vākyaṃ mūrdhnā pratīcchāmi sarvaśiṣyo bhavāmy ahaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:325_0: tatra yaḥ pṛṣṭhato bhītiṃ śrāvayed anyato 'pi vā /
SA11sanss19u:326_0: pradviṣṭo vā prasanno vā same prāṇapradaḥ suhṛt //
SA11sanss19u:332_0: viduṣā bālavapuṣā lokavismayakāriṇā //mañjuśrī saṃjñakaṃ yat tat piṇḍībhūtaṃ jagaddhitaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:339_0: iti jinatanayānāṃ sarvathâtyadbhutānāṃ caritam upanibdhyôpārjitaṃ yac chubhaṃ me /
SA11sanss19u:340_0: bhavatu sukham anantaṃ dehināṃ tena yāvat sugatapadam ana-
